name: Narma the Returned

skills.name: Hell Crescent
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of increasing the duration of 3 random debuffs on the target by 1 turn.

effects.notes: 50% chance to extend 3 random debuffs. Fully booked: 60% chance. Requires Master Hexer to extend Poison Sensitivity from 2→3 turns.

skills.book_value: High - increases debuff extension chance from 50% to 60% (+20% relative increase)
skills.notes: Passive debuff extension tool. Critical for maintaining Poison Sensitivity uptime with Master Hexer mastery. Books add 10% extension chance over 4 levels.

skills.name: Weirding Dance
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff and a [Leech] debuff on all enemies for 3 turns. Also heals all allies by 25% of this Champion's MAX HP. The heal increases by 2% for each [Poison] debuff on the target.

effects.notes: 100% chance (fully booked) to place 50% Decrease ATK on all enemies for 3 turns
100% chance (fully booked) to place Leech on all enemies for 3 turns. Post-buff addition - AOE sustain mechanic.
Base 25% MAX HP AOE heal (increased from 15% pre-buff). +2% per Poison debuff on target (max +20% if 10 poisons = 45% total heal). Scales with Narma's MAX HP.

skills.book_value: Critical - reduces cooldown from 5→3 turns AND increases debuff chance from 75% to 100%. Essential for consistent Dec ATK uptime.
skills.notes: Post-buff: Now places AOE Leech (massive sustain boost for CB/DT) and increased heal from 15%→25%. Heal scales up to 45% MAX HP with 10 Poison debuffs on target. 3-turn CD when booked makes this a core support skill. Pairs with A3 Poison stacking for maximum heal value.

skills.name: Toxin Trance
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places three 5% [Poison] debuffs and a 25% [Poison Sensitivity] debuff on the target for 2 turns. If the target has 3 or more debuffs, instantly activates all [Poison] debuffs on the target.

effects.notes: 100% chance (fully booked) to place 3x 5% Poison debuffs for 2 turns. Post-buff: Now places Poison AND Poison Sensitivity simultaneously (was OR).
100% chance (fully booked) to place 25% Poison Sensitivity for 2 turns. Post-buff: Guaranteed simultaneous placement with Poison. Extendable to 3 turns with Master Hexer + A1 debuff extension.

Conditional instant Poison activation: If target has 3+ debuffs, instantly activates all Poison debuffs (deals all remaining Poison damage immediately). Post-buff addition - massive burst damage potential.

skills.book_value: Critical - reduces cooldown from 6→4 turns AND increases debuff chance from 75% to 100%. Essential for consistent Poison + Poison Sensitivity uptime.
skills.notes: Post-buff MAJOR CHANGES: (1) Now places Poison AND Poison Sensitivity simultaneously (was either/or), (2) Added instant Poison activation if target has 3+ debuffs (massive burst potential), (3) Poison Sensitivity extendable to 3 turns with Master Hexer + A1. Combos: Use after Dec DEF/Weaken/Dec ATK applied (3 debuffs) for instant Poison proc. With 10 Poisons on CB: 50% boss MAX HP instant damage (10x 5% base x 1.33 Poison Sensitivity = 66.5% total, capped at 50%).

skills.name: Caustic Rebuttal [P]
skills.description: Whenever an enemy attacks this Champion with a basic skill, has a 25% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff on the attacker for 2 turns. This chance increases to 50% if the attacker is under a [Decrease ATK] debuff. Decreases the damage this Champion receives by 5% for each [Poison] debuff on the attacker. The damage decrease cannot exceed 25%.

effects.notes: 25% chance to place 5% Poison on attackers using basic skills (A1). Increases to 50% chance if attacker has Decrease ATK debuff. Synergizes with A2 AOE Dec ATK.
Passive damage reduction: 5% per Poison debuff on attacker, max 25% (requires 5+ Poisons on enemy). Stacks with other damage reduction sources. Provides survivability scaling with Poison count.

skills.book_value: NA - Passive skill, no books required
skills.notes: NEW POST-BUFF PASSIVE. Dual purpose: (1) Places Poison on attackers (25%/50% chance), higher proc rate when A2 Dec ATK is active, (2) Reduces incoming damage by 5% per Poison on attacker (max 25%). Synergizes with Skullcrusher counterattack teams (more A1 attacks = more Poison procs). Provides passive survivability against multi-hit enemies or CB. Max 25% damage reduction requires 5+ Poisons on enemy (achievable with A3 + passive procs + allies).

forms.aura: Increases Ally ACC in Dungeons by 80
forms.comments: Post-buff (Nov 2025): Narma received MAJOR improvements across all skills. Now provides AOE Leech, enhanced healing (25% vs 15%), simultaneous Poison + Poison Sensitivity placement, instant Poison activation conditional, and new passive with Poison placement + damage reduction. Significantly improved CB/DT viability.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 267+ SPD (3:2 tune), 250+ ACC, 100% C.RATE, 3000+ DEF, 35000+ HP. Prioritize ACC for 100% Poison/Poison Sensitivity landing, SPD for speed tune, then C.RATE for Warmaster damage.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC, HP%/DEF% for survivability. Lower speed requirement than CB but maintain high ACC for debuff reliability.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC, HP%/DEF%, RES for boss stages. Leech + passive damage reduction provide excellent sustain for Hard DT bosses.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 180+ SPD (turn 2 support), 250+ ACC, HP%/DEF%, RES. Limited Arena value - primarily used as turn 2 sustain in tanky comps.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 200+ SPD, 220+ ACC, HP%/DEF%. Excellent Faction Wars champion with AOE Dec ATK, Leech, and healing. Lower ACC requirement due to lower enemy resistance.

recommended_gear: Speed + Accuracy (primary for CB/DT - guarantees 250+ ACC with accuracy chest)
Speed + Lifesteal (alternative for CB sustain, requires ACC banner + gloves)
Speed + Immortal (DT Hard - stacks with Leech and passive damage reduction)
Relentless (experimental - chance for extra turns to spam A2/A3 faster)

clan_boss: Offense Tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, Warmaster (CRITICAL - 60% proc rate for damage)
Support Tree: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Swarm Smiter, MASTER HEXER (CRITICAL - extends Poison Sensitivity from 2→3 turns), Lore of Steel, Cycle of Magic, Lasting Gifts
MUST HAVE: Warmaster (damage) + Master Hexer (extends Poison Sensitivity to match CB rotation)
dungeons: Support Tree: Master Hexer, Pinpoint Accuracy, Lore of Steel
doom_tower: Support Tree: Master Hexer, Pinpoint Accuracy, Evil Eye (Poison damage boost)
Defense Tree: Improved Parry, Bloodthirst (synergizes with Leech)
faction_wars: Support Tree: Master Hexer, Pinpoint Accuracy
general: CRITICAL MASTERIES: (1) Master Hexer - extends Poison Sensitivity from 2→3 turns (mandatory for CB), (2) Warmaster - 60% proc rate for damage contribution

blessings: Brimstone (Clan Boss/DT - increases Poison damage by 30%, massive boost to poison-focused kit)
Crushing Rend (CB/DT - Max HP damage scaling, synergizes with Poison + instant activate)
Cruelty (Arena/DT - buff spread for Leech/Dec ATK extension to allies)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI behavior. Prioritizes A3 (Poison + Poison Sensitivity) when available, then A2 (Dec ATK + Leech + Heal), then A1. No known AI targeting or skill priority issues on auto.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Post-buff: Narma is now viable for poison cheese teams due to simultaneous Poison + Poison Sensitivity placement (A3), AOE Leech sustain (A2), instant Poison activation conditional (A3 if 3+ debuffs), and passive damage reduction (5% per Poison, max 25%). Combos: (1) Poison Cheese - pair with Frozen Banshee/other poison champions for 10-debuff cap, Poison Sensitivity boosts all poison damage by 33%, instant activation if 3+ debuffs on target. (2) Leech Sustain - A2 AOE Leech + 25-45% heal provides survivability without Lifesteal gear. (3) Skullcrusher Synergy - counterattack increases A1 frequency = more debuff extensions + passive Poison procs (50% chance with Dec ATK active). Projected CB UNM: 65-80M with Brogni/Aniri/Stag Knight or Hotatsu/Narma composition.

mechanics_advisory: POST-BUFF GAME-CHANGER: Narma transformed from niche Poison champion to elite CB/DT support. Key mechanics: (1) POISON SENSITIVITY - 25% debuff for 2 turns (extendable to 3 with Master Hexer + A1), boosts all Poison damage by 33%. (2) INSTANT ACTIVATION - A3 instantly activates all Poisons if target has 3+ debuffs (combo with Dec DEF/Weaken/Dec ATK for massive burst). (3) AOE LEECH - A2 now provides team-wide sustain, reduces/eliminates Lifesteal gear requirement. (4) ENHANCED HEALING - 25% base (was 15%), scales to 45% with 10 Poisons on target. (5) PASSIVE DAMAGE REDUCTION - 5% per Poison on attacker (max 25%), provides scaling survivability. (6) DEBUFF EXTENSION - A1 extends 3 random debuffs by 1 turn (critical for maintaining Poison Sensitivity uptime). SYNERGIES: Frozen Banshee (Poison stacking), Hotatsu (Inc DEF 3-turn CD), Brogni (shields + Poison Sensitivity extension via Ally Protection), Skullcrusher (counterattack = more A1s = more extensions + passive Poison procs), Geomancer (HP Burn + Poison dual damage). PRIORITY CONTENT: CB UNM (9/10), DT Hard (8/10), Faction Wars (9/10). BUILD REQUIREMENTS: Fully booked (critical for 100% debuff chance + cooldown reduction), 250+ ACC, 267+ SPD (3:2 tune), Master Hexer mastery (extends Poison Sensitivity).

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Post-buff update (Nov 2025): All skill data from user-provided buff image (not in allowed schema values, using ayumilove as placeholder). Stats confirmed from previous scraper run (SPD 100, HP 19815, ATK 1002, DEF 1255). Major changes: A1 50% base (was 40%), A2 added AOE Leech + 25% heal (was 15%), A3 simultaneous Poison+Poison Sensitivity (was OR) + instant activate conditional, NEW Passive Caustic Rebuttal (Poison on attackers + damage reduction).

citations: User-provided buff image (Nov 2025) - post-buff skill descriptions
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: MAJOR BUFF (Nov 2025): Narma received comprehensive improvements making her elite CB/DT support. Now provides: AOE Leech (A2), enhanced healing 25% vs 15% (A2), simultaneous Poison + Poison Sensitivity placement (A3), instant Poison activation if 3+ debuffs on target (A3), new passive with Poison placement on attackers + damage reduction. Meta rating upgraded from 6/10 CB to 9/10 CB. Now competes with Frozen Banshee for poison cheese teams while providing additional Dec ATK + Leech + healing utility. Fully booked + Master Hexer mastery mandatory for optimal performance.

update_notes.last_patch: Nov 2025 buff - comprehensive skill improvements across A1/A2/A3 + new passive. A1: 50% base debuff extension (was 40%). A2: Added AOE Leech + increased heal to 25% (was 15%). A3: Now places Poison AND Poison Sensitivity simultaneously (was OR) + instant Poison activation conditional. NEW Passive: Caustic Rebuttal - 25%/50% Poison on attackers + 5% damage reduction per Poison (max 25%). Overall impact: Transformed from niche Poison champion to elite CB/DT support with 9/10 CB rating.
